mapper.update:
UPDATE AC_OPERATOR
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_name = #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_status = #{operatorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inval_date = #{invalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
auth_mode = #{authMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lock_limit = #{lockLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
err_count = #{errCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lock_time = #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
unlock_time = #{unlockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_login = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
valid_time = #{validTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mac_code = #{macCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip_address = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
mapper.sql: guid as guid ,user_id as userId ,password as password ,operator_name as operatorName ,operator_status as operatorStatus ,inval_date as invalDate ,auth_mode as authMode ,lock_limit as lockLimit ,err_count as errCount ,lock_time as lockTime ,unlock_time as unlockTime ,menu_type as menuType ,last_login as lastLogin ,start_date as startDate ,end_date as endDate ,valid_time as validTime ,mac_code as macCode ,ip_address as ipAddress
